name: Crunchy Sweet Blackened Shrimp
author: Anonymous
summary: My mom and co-workers love when I make this and share. You can make as much or as little as you want and add or reduce ingredients as you see fit for your taste. It's the butter, balsamic vinegar, and honey that makes this blackened shrimp dish! Serve with rice or over fettuccine Alfredo.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen shrimp, deveined and tails removed, thawed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Melt butter in a frying pan over high heat
Add shrimp, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, dill, basil, and cayenne
Stir and season with salt and pepper
Cook until honey and balsamic vinegar start to bubble, about 5 minutes
Cover with a lid; cook, stirring occasionally, until liquid is completely reduced and shrimp are blackened in spots, about 10 minutes
